collectors.title: Database
collectors.titleDetails: (24 total Queries, 24 of them unique across 1 Connection)

queries.sql: SELECT * FROM `tbl_position` WHERE `posID` = '1'

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>Where exemptions are being applied, has it been ensured that the company is still eligible to take advantage of these (Appendix 1.4, Ab2)?</p>', '1', '1', 'ab1', '3.13 Ab1', '57', 'Active', '2024-04-15 21:00:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>Has other information in documents containing the audited financial statements, including the Directors’ Report (if applicable), been reviewed to ensure that it is consistent with the audited financial statements, prepared in accordance with applicable legal requirements and is it, to the best of the auditors’ knowledge, free from error (ISA 720.14)?</p>', '99', '99', 'ab1', '3.13 Ab1', '57', 'Active', '2024-04-15 21:00:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>Are references to the length of the accounting period correct (i.e. year or period ended)?</p>', '88', '88', 'ab1', '3.13 Ab1', '57', 'Active', '2024-04-15 21:00:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>Has the name of the company and the director(s) been spelt correctly throughout the annual report and does the company name agree exactly to that registered at our companies’ registry? </p>', '', '', 'ab1', '3.13 Ab1', '57', 'Active', '2024-04-15 21:00:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>Have the financial statements been cast?</p>', '', '', 'ab1', '3.13 Ab1', '57', 'Active', '2024-04-15 21:00:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>Are references to ‘Director(s)’ consistent with the number of directors?</p>', '', '', 'ab1', '3.13 Ab1', '57', 'Active', '2024-04-15 21:00:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>Are all pages numbered and are these in agreement with references given in the contents page and audit report?</p>', '', '', 'ab1', '3.13 Ab1', '57', 'Active', '2024-04-15 21:00:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>Have the corresponding amounts been checked?</p>', '', '', 'ab1', '3.13 Ab1', '57', 'Active', '2024-04-15 21:00:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>If corresponding amounts are unaudited, have they been annotated as such, and has an “Other Matter” paragraph been included in the audit report (ISA 710.14 / ISA 706.10 and 11)?</p>', '', '', 'ab1', '3.13 Ab1', '57', 'Active', '2024-04-15 21:00:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>Is the use of brackets correctly and consistently applied throughout the primary statements and notes?</p>', '', '', 'ab1', '3.13 Ab1', '57', 'Active', '2024-04-15 21:00:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>Does the Statement of Financial Position balance?</p>', '', '', 'ab1', '3.13 Ab1', '57', 'Active', '2024-04-15 21:00:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>Have items in the Statement of Financial Position and Performance Statement(s) been cross-referenced to the lead schedules?</p>', '', '', 'ab1', '3.13 Ab1', '57', 'Active', '2024-04-15 21:00:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>Does any additional ‘management information’ such as a detailed analysis of profit or loss (if applicable) agree to the information in the statutory section of the financial statements and has it been annotated, as <i>‘These pages do not form part of the audited financial statements’</i>?</p>', '', '', 'ab1', '3.13 Ab1', '57', 'Active', '2024-04-15 21:00:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>Do the note numbers agree to the Statement of Financial Position, Statement of Changes in Equity, Statement of Cash Flows and the Performance Statement(s) (where relevant) and are they consecutively numbered?</p>', '', '', 'ab1', '3.13 Ab1', '57', 'Active', '2024-04-15 21:00:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p><i>(If applicable)</i> Has the Statement of Cash Flows (including notes) been cross referenced to the S section of the file?</p>', '', '', 'ab1', '3.13 Ab1', '57', 'Active', '2024-04-15 21:00:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>Where notes contain references to page numbers or other notes are they correct?</p>', '', '', 'ab1', '3.13 Ab1', '57', 'Active', '2024-04-15 21:00:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>Does the detail in the notes agree to the primary statements?</p>', '', '', 'ab1', '3.13 Ab1', '57', 'Active', '2024-04-15 21:00:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p><i>(If applicable)</i> Do the pages referred to in the audit report exclude the Directors’ Report and any ‘management information’?</p>', '', '', 'ab1', '3.13 Ab1', '57', 'Active', '2024-04-15 21:00:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>Does the Audit Report correctly refer to ‘profit’ or ‘loss’ or ‘results’ as applicable?</p>', '', '', 'ab1', '3.13 Ab1', '57', 'Active', '2024-04-15 21:00:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>Does the sign off on the Audit Report refer to, and include the name of the “Statutory Auditor”?</p>', '', '', 'ab1', '3.13 Ab1', '57', 'Active', '2024-04-15 21:00:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>Does the period covered by the Audit Report and (if applicable) the Directors’ Report agree to the front cover of the financial statements?</p>', '', '', 'ab1', '3.13 Ab1', '57', 'Active', '2024-04-15 21:00:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>(If applicable) Does the Directors’ Report include the correct profit or loss figure?</p>', '', '', 'ab1', '3.13 Ab1', '57', 'Active', '2024-04-15 21:00:02')

params.name: $head =
params.value: Critical review of the Financial Statements

session.name: Davies John
session.allowed:
stdClass Object
(
    [add] => Yes
    [edit] => Yes
    [acin] => Yes
    [clm] => Yes
    [cl] => Yes
    [sd] => Yes
    [audm] => Yes
    [aud] => Yes
    [frm] => Yes
    [sett] => Yes
    [dash] => Yes
)

post.question:
Array
(
    [0] => <p>Where exemptions are being applied, has it been ensured that the company is still eligible to take advantage of these (Appendix 1.4, Ab2)?</p>
    [1] => <p>Has other information in documents containing the audited financial statements, including the Directors’ Report (if applicable), been reviewed to ensure that it is consistent with the audited financial statements, prepared in accordance with applicable legal requirements and is it, to the best of the auditors’ knowledge, free from error (ISA 720.14)?</p>
    [2] => <p>Are references to the length of the accounting period correct (i.e. year or period ended)?</p>
    [3] => <p>Has the name of the company and the director(s) been spelt correctly throughout the annual report and does the company name agree exactly to that registered at our companies’ registry? </p>
    [4] => <p>Have the financial statements been cast?</p>
    [5] => <p>Are references to ‘Director(s)’ consistent with the number of directors?</p>
    [6] => <p>Are all pages numbered and are these in agreement with   references given in the contents page and audit report?</p>
    [7] => <p>Have the corresponding amounts been checked?</p>
    [8] => <p>If corresponding amounts are unaudited, have they been annotated as such, and has an “Other Matter” paragraph been included in the audit report (ISA 710.14 / ISA 706.10 and 11)?</p>
    [9] => <p>Is the use of brackets correctly and consistently applied throughout the primary statements and notes?</p>
    [10] => <p>Does the Statement of Financial Position balance?</p>
    [11] => <p>Have items in the Statement of Financial Position and Performance Statement(s) been cross-referenced to the lead schedules?</p>
    [12] => <p>Does any additional ‘management information’ such as a detailed analysis of profit or loss (if applicable) agree to the information in the statutory section of the financial statements and has it been annotated, as <i>‘These pages do not form part of the audited financial statements’</i>?</p>
    [13] => <p>Do the note numbers agree to the Statement of Financial Position, Statement of Changes in Equity, Statement of Cash Flows and the Performance Statement(s) (where relevant) and are they consecutively numbered?</p>
    [14] => <p><i>(If applicable)</i> Has the Statement of Cash Flows (including notes) been cross referenced to the S section of the file?</p>
    [15] => <p>Where notes contain references to page numbers or other notes are they correct?</p>
    [16] => <p>Does the detail in the notes agree to the primary statements?</p>
    [17] => <p><i>(If applicable)</i> Do the pages referred to in the audit report exclude the Directors’ Report and any ‘management information’?</p>
    [18] => <p>Does the Audit Report correctly refer to ‘profit’ or ‘loss’ or ‘results’ as applicable?</p>
    [19] => <p>Does the sign off on the Audit Report refer to, and include the name of the “Statutory Auditor”?</p>
    [20] => <p>Does the period covered by the Audit Report and (if applicable) the Directors’ Report agree to the front cover of the financial statements?</p>
    [21] => <p>(If applicable) Does the Directors’ Report include the correct profit or loss figure?</p>
)
